meanings.definition: In a way that can be avoided.
meanings.sent1: She tripped avoidably on the loose shoelace.
meanings.sent2: He quickly and avoidably changed lanes to avoid traffic.
meanings.sent3: The cat avoidably knocked over the vase while chasing a fly.
meanings.sent4: The student avoidably stumbled over his words during the presentation.
meanings.sent5: The toddler avoidably spilled juice all over the table.

meanings.sent1: The avoidably dangerous path was marked with warning signs.
meanings.sent2: It was an avoidably awkward situation that could have been prevented.
meanings.sent3: The avoidably late bus driver made the passengers grumble.
meanings.sent4: Her avoidably loud laughter echoed through the quiet library.
meanings.sent5: The avoidably messy room needed a good cleaning.
